overview: I'm so excited to bring you this extremely hot DVD. Cole outdid himself with directing two very hot scenes. I was on hand to help him out, but for the most part he pulled it off very well by himself. All you Dean fans will be glad to see him back on the scene along with Hayden who got his own set of fans in Soldier's Ball 2: Bareback Promenade and Trevor who made his debut in Fire In The Hole where he gave Cole all of his nine inches and helped break Colin in for his first video. Hot Zone 2 also features Chaz and Damien giving you five hot guys in two really hot scenes. Cole gets as down and dirty as I do in his directing and gets some really good angles and positions that I wouldn't have myself. I'm pleased to bring you this very special Active Duty DVD.
title: Hot Zone 2
